Class PlayerSprite

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.csupomona.cs.cs141.prog_assgmnt_team.GUIEntity
      • edu.csupomona.cs.cs141.prog_assgmnt_team.PlayerSprite

  • public class PlayerSprite
extends GUIEntity
    This class keeps track of the player sprite and what direction they are face as well as draws them to the screen.

        public void movePlayer(SpyVsNinja.EntityDirec direction)

      • setPos

        public void setPos(int x,
          int y)
        This method tells the sprite where to move of the screen. Player moves acording to grid and is changed from number on grid to number of pixels on screen.
        Parameters:
        x - location X on the grid.
        y - location Y on the grid.
